title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
message: Another problem with 820-01521 backlight, everything works and after i shut lid panel and goes to sleep, waking up with no bl.

title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
message:
Tried SMC reset?

Check SMC_LID_LEFT/RIGHT signals.

title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
message: when bl gone, it dosent show lid signals.

title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
message:
The board is on for sure, 1V8_SLPS2R present?
Possibly corroded Hall sensors, check them.

title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
message: where to find hall sensors can u say specific name on schematic

title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
message: Sensors are okay, changed topcase for testing and still same problem

title: 820-01521 pre backlight problem
message: Post U4802 voltages, when problem appears.
